objects.text:
• Premium Leather Construction
• Handcrafted Decorative Details
• Comfortable Padded Insole
• Durable Rubber Outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
This banner showcases a stylish, earthy-tone advertisement for a boho-chic sneaker. The layout is split into four quadrants using a diagonally intersecting background in soft beige and clay tones. The product image (id: `product_image`) sits diagonally across the top right, creating dynamic visual balance. Three prominently placed text layers—`heading_1`, `heading_2`, and `subheading`—convey the product's artisan, comfort-forward message. Key footwear features are listed in a clean bulleted format (`description`). Bold white pricing (`price`) is prominently displayed above a contrasting dark brown call-to-action button (`cta_background` + `cta`). Decorative swirling lines and semi-transparent circles add organic character.

**Color Palette:**
- Beige (#F5EEE2)
- Light Tan (#E8D8C0)
- Tan (#D2B48C)
- Burnt Orange (#CD853F)
- Saddle Brown (#8B4513)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Light Brown (#BC8F8F)
product_color: The product image showcases a sneaker inspired by a dessert-like aesthetic, blending warm and appetizing tones. The dominant color is a rich caramel brown (#C86F3D), used on the laces and sole details, giving warmth and depth. Creamy beige (#F3D4A0) and sand hues (#E6B887) serve as the base, smoothly transitioning into soft highlights of ivory white (#FDF6E3) and subtle golden amber (#D88948). The colors are layered to create contrast and dimension while maintaining harmony and a handcrafted look. These tones create a delectable, stylish impression perfect for attracting attention in an advertisement banner aimed at fashion and lifestyle audiences.
